term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - loading capacity in solvent extraction
term.title: loading capacity

item.text: The maximum concentration of solute(s) that a solvent can contain under specified conditions.

notes.item: The terms maximum loading, saturation capacity and saturation loading are synonymous.
All the above terms should clearly be distinguished from ultimate capacity (in solvent extraction).

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 2373. 'Nomenclature for liquid-liquid distribution (solvent extraction) (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 2384 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365112373)
